product_name: Brooks NightLife Equilibrium T-Shirt - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: When your training routine takes you to the pavement at dawn or dusk, the men's NightLife Equilibrium T-shirt from Brooks enhances your visibility and regulates your comfort with performance fabric. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying polyester is blended with spandex for top-notch performance and high mobility. Reflecive highlights increase your visibility to motorists, and they are visible from every angle. Flat seams feel comfortable against skin and reduce chafing. The Brooks NightLife Equilibrium T-shirt for men features an athletic, close-to-body fit. Closeout.
short_description: When your training routine takes you to the pavement at dawn or dusk, the men's NightLife Equilibrium T-shirt from Brooks enhances your visibility and regulates your comfort with performance fabric.
